movie.title: Shifter
movie.description_intro: A young woman experiences painful and gruesome side effects after an experiment with time travel goes wrong.
movie.description_full: A young woman experiences painful and gruesome side effects after an experiment with time travel goes wrong.

movies.title: Pitbull. Nowe porzadki
movies.summary: Policemen from two precincts join forces to fight a criminal band called the "Mokotowska Group".
movies.description_full: Policemen from two precincts join forces to fight a criminal band called the "Mokotowska Group".
movies.synopsis: Policemen from two precincts join forces to fight a criminal band called the "Mokotowska Group".

movies.title: The Giant Behemoth
movies.summary: The dumping of radioactive waste in the ocean disturbs a prehistoric monster than can project electric shocks and radioactive beams. After terrorizing the English coast, it is discovered that if the creature is destroyed with conventional weaponry it would spread a dangerous amount radioactive contamination over the entire country, with this fact preventing the military from attacking the monster as it nears London.

movies.title: The Canterbury Tales
movies.summary: Pasolini's artistic, sometimes violent, always vividly cinematic retelling of some of Chaucer's most erotic tales.
movies.description_full: Pasolini's artistic, sometimes violent, always vividly cinematic retelling of some of Chaucer's most erotic tales.
movies.synopsis: Pasolini's artistic, sometimes violent, always vividly cinematic retelling of some of Chaucer's most erotic tales.

movies.title: An Unfinished Life
movies.summary: To escape an abusive boyfriend, without announcing her plans in advance, Jean Gilkyson takes her young daughter Griff to the Wyoming ranch of her father-in-law, Einar. Jean and Einar are disaffected, as he blames her for the death of his son in a car accident. Einar is taking care of his friend Mitch, who was attacked by a bear, and Einar does not know that he has a granddaughter. While Mitch heals and forgives the bear, Einar also changes his feelings regarding Jean, finally understanding that accidents happen and accepting her and loving Griff.
